About JellyJam

A squishy, creative game jam where indie devs dive into ocean-inspired ideas together.

ğŸŒŠ

The Squish

Flow together with a community of indie devs. Create games that feel fluid and fun. All skill levels welcome in our ocean!

ğŸ™

The Theme

Dive into "Marine". Interpret it mechanically, narratively, or visually. Jellies included, but let your creativity swim free!

ğŸ†

The Loot

Top games get surfaced on this website and win some prizes! Rising stars of the game jam ocean!

ğŸŒŠ Currents of Support ğŸŒŠ

ğŸ¤ Water Rules

Keep our ocean clean and kind.

"Fresh Water Only": All code and assets must be made during the jam or be CC0. Keep it clean!

"Don't Sting": Be kind and supportive. Our ocean is friendliest when we lift each other up.

JellyJam 2026 is fully in person, a once in a lifetime opportunity to experience, learn, and explore the vibrant world of indie game development.

ğŸŒŠ Deep Dive (FAQ)

Curious about how this all works? Let's answer your questions.

What even is a Game Jam? â†“

It's a hackathon for games! You have 12 hours to create from scratch based on our Marine theme. At the end, you submit your creation and the community rates it! Perfect for learning, experimenting, and having fun.

Do I need a team? â†“

Nope! You can go solo (Lone Jelly) or form a school of fish (up to 4 members). Check our Discord to find teammates with complementary skills. Solo jellyfish welcome!
